normalized: if you harboured a yearning for the inhuman, if you wanted guidance to a world where demons live…
this place was nothing more than an entrance to that hell.
that arena was now dominated by roars and cheers.
in the deep darkness of the arena, where the lighting had been turned off, kiryuu chuckled to himself.
the audience's anticipation was at its peak.
they were waiting eagerly, and that went for kiryuu as well.
he was yearning impatiently for this.
the lights came on, and the cheering heated up even more.
who would play the leading parts in today's game?
they were waiting eagerly to see the fate of the person who had gone up onto the stage.
now, one figure was before their eyes.
one of the leading parts of today's main event.
the figure who appeared on the stage was…

name: kiryuu
normalized: all the audience have been waiting for a taimanin.
kiryuu, who had gotten up on the stage with murasaki, called off the restraints of her mind and body via the tumour.
it was understandable for her to panic, and open her eyes wide in surprise.
when murasaki had captured ingrid, control of her body (including her consciousness) had been taken away via the tumour, and she had been brought here today just like that.
as far as murasaki was concerned, the instant after she had bound ingrid's arms behind her back, she was standing on the stage of the chaos arena, which was packed with spectators.

name: murasaki
normalized: what's the meaning of this, kiryuu…?
the legs of murasaki, who had immediately tried to grab hold of him, wobbled.
no――her legs were the only things that weren't shaking.
kiryuu had prevented the movement of murasaki's legs by controlling her with the tumour.

name: kiryuu
normalized: certainly, you're an important part of this show, but the real leading actress is here.

name: kiryuu
normalized: starting now, i'll let you see the person you most wanted to meet.
behind murasaki, kiryuu raised one hand up high.
among the cheers of the sold-out audience, the other leading actress… sakura got up on the stage, being pulled by a chain.
murasaki had reflexively raised her voice due to this reunion with her friend, but…
she was blindfolded and proceeding unsteadily on all fours, and on both of sakura's…
the amputation shackles that were supposed to have been removed were casting a dull light.
kiryuu responded to the scream from murasaki's heart, jumping up on the spot.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you believed the things i said?
i'm normally an enemy, aren't i?
bending his thin body backward, kiryuu basked in the lights as he laughed like he had gone insane.

name: kiryuu
normalized: how should i put it, murasaki…?
haven't you realized the reason why so many spectators have gathered?
for the first time, murasaki became aware of the words that the countless spectators were yelling behind kiryuu, who was tilting his head to the side and holding one hand to his ear.

name: kiryuu
normalized: and more than that, it's a hated taimanin!
the audience responded to kiryuu's exclamations with a roar.

name: kiryuu
normalized: they've been kept waiting for a long time!
so, i'm going to detonate the amputation shackles simultaneously!

name: kiryuu
normalized: as dying is certain, will she die instantly, or will she die writhing in agony?

name: kiryuu
normalized: your job is to watch sakura blowing up from there, mortified.
it's an important role, isn't it?
sakura looked in murasaki's direction due to the sorrowful cry that had reached her ears among the cheering.

name: murasaki
normalized: quickly, quickly, get away from there…!

name: sakura
normalized: i'm sorry for being a burden, but don't lose, murasaki!

name: kiryuu
normalized: but, murasaki cannot escape from the tumour's control!
kiryuu raised one hand very high, and put his thumb and middle finger together.

name: kiryuu
normalized: with this, i will make you carry out your role!
now, drive murasaki to despair with your tragic death!

name: murasaki
normalized: do whatever you like, anything you like to me…!
sakura's voice again shot toward murasaki, who pleaded with both feet still stuck to the ground.

name: sakura
normalized: i'm really sorry, so don't give up until the end!
even i still haven't given up!

name: kiryuu
normalized: now, we begin the show's main eve…
it was at that moment, when he was about to snap his raised fingers.
an arrow of light, which reflected the illumination of the arena.
that had shone in kiryuu's field of vision.
having produced the short sword, which she had been hiding inside her shadow, sakura had cut off her blindfold in an instant, and had thrown it toward kiryuu's throat, just like that.
by the time it had been seen and identified, the kodachi had reached kiryuu's body.
…kiryuu promptly pushed it out with his tentacle.
the anti-demon power that dwelled within the short sword gave kiryuu intense pain that felt like his entire body was going to be torn to pieces.
however, it had not resulted in a fatal wound.
while foaming at the mouth, kiryuu desperately tried to suppress the pain coming from the tentacle that the short sword had pierced.
sakura had been forced to the arena floor by kiryuu's subordinates, who had come running.
while spewing bodily fluids, which flowed out from the place where the short sword had struck him, kiryuu scowled at sakura, who was on her hands and knees on the floor.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this was the source of your hope?!
the flame in her eyes that had never gone out, despite her being soiled, raped and humiliated…

name: kiryuu
normalized: that singleminded determination to get revenge on me with just one little short sword, just one blow, just one strike…!
kiryuu's laughter was heaped upon sakura, who smiled fearlessly at this late stage.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this is the stench of a frightened weasel, the howling of a dog who's lost her fight!
or, to put it another way: you missed, didn't you?!
perhaps because the pain had drawn back, kiryuu proclaimed so with a face that was bright and cheerful, while now savouring the joy of victory.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i guess you were waiting for a chance to rescue murasaki, but… if so, you could have decapi- tated me in my sleep at any time while you were being kept in my room.

name: kiryuu
normalized: if you did, then at least you might have been saved, and yet…

name: kiryuu
normalized: you've lost your only hope, which you protected so zealously until the end…!

name: murasaki
normalized: i certainly understood… your hope, sakura…
a voice was heard from behind him.
kiryuu slowly looked back at the owner of that voice.
a short sword was sticking in between murasaki's breasts, and it was obvious even to an onlooker that its depth had reached her heart.
what murasaki was grasping, and was now just about to pull out, was…

name: murasaki
normalized: did you forget about sakura's double-sword style?
due to the words of murasaki, who extolled a calm fighting spirit, kiryuu understood everything.

name: kiryuu
normalized: th, that was your true intent…?!
sakura's short sword, which had been fired at kiryuu, was a distraction.
without changing her expression one bit, murasaki gripped the short sword that had pierced through her, and slowly pulled it out.
kiryuu saw that fumes of burning flesh were rising up from murasaki's chest with a sizzling sound.
…kiryuu remembered that, when he was raping sakura in his room, he had told her about the tumour embedded in murasaki's body.
and that it took away murasaki's freedom.
sakura had listened to those words…
her other kodachi, which was loaded with anti-demon power, had gone into murasaki's chest.
in her chest, in which the tumour had been embedded.
he screamed when he realized that he had made a huge mistake.
sakura had been waiting for this opportunity from the beginning.
having realized her intentions, murasaki had placed trust in sakura, and let her pierce through her with the short sword, heart and all…
kiryuu's hair stood on end, and he screamed… however.

name: kiryuu
normalized: every one of your hopes were naive, weren't they?!
his screams suddenly changed to laughter, with his whole body bending backward.

name: kiryuu
normalized: you thought you had out- smarted me?
that you could destroy your heart, and, in exchange, the tumour?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: the tumour has already assimi- lated with your tissue!
if your heart is revived with your regeneration ability…

name: kiryuu
normalized: that revives the function of the tumour as well!
once it's restored, you will go back to being my puppet, murasaki!
still silent, murasaki was listening to kiryuu's words.

name: murasaki
normalized: as long as i have a few seconds of freedom, from now until my heart stops moving, that's enough… isn't that so, demonologist kiryuu sabato…?!
her heart having been destroyed, murasaki stared at kiryuu.
a blade loaded with anti-demon power…
turning his back on murasaki, kiryuu attempted to escape at full speed.
he detached his own tentacles, together with sakura's short sword, in which anti-demon power still remained.
they were nothing but a hindrance to his escape.
right now, he had to escape above all else.
a few seconds would be enough.
if he could manage to hold on for a few seconds, murasaki would collapse.
after that, murasaki would try to regenerate her heart, and the tumour, which would be revived simultaneously, would take away murasaki's freedo…
kiryuu felt a burning pain in his back, and his field of vision was instantly enveloped by darkness.
the roar of the audience, who panicked and tried to escape from the arena, sounded awfully far away.
if i had thought about it.
if i had fought without running away.
if it were just a few seconds, even i might have…
within the darkness, kiryuu shook his head.
i should refrain from barbaric behaviour like that…
kiryuu nodded, holding on to that belief.
the roar of the audience had become even more distant, and he finally became unable to hear it.

name: murasaki
normalized: sa, sakura, are you all right…?
immediately after she had escaped from the tumour's control and slain kiryuu, the flow of blood disappeared from the body of murasaki, whose heart had been destroyed.
while staggering and gasping, murasaki approached sakura little by little.
kiryuu's subordinates fled, and sakura, who had become free even though the amputation shackles were still attached, also crawled towards murasaki, exhausted.
having embraced and supported murasaki after she had fallen to her knees on the floor, sakura raised a high- pitched voice.
at the place that sakura pointed towards, a man dressed in a doctor's coat had suddenly stood up.
not a single thing remained in the face of the man who had looked back at them.
not his intelligence, or even his human consciousness…
twisting his face into an evil expression, giving off a strange voice and moving his arms and legs haphazardly, his figure was…
the body of murasaki, who had begun to stand up in order to deliver the finishing blow, lurched diagonally and crashed to the floor.
tentacles appeared all over his body, and the man, who had been tilting his head to the side and fidgeting, suddenly gave a big nod.
even losing his name from back when he used to be human, the man screamed loudly.
swinging his tentacles around haphazardly, the man looked just like he was dancing happily.

name: murasaki
normalized: no… that is not kiryuu anymore.
a tentacle, which the man had raised overhead, skimmed just past sakura's eyes.
the tentacles were struck without holding back, and they blew away the ground itself, drilling large holes.
the impulses of the youma that had once been kiryuu would not settle down.
the tentacles even attacked the audience seating, and with force that seemed like they were about to destroy the arena itself.
the image of a man in a doctor's coat rampaging around was reflected in the eyes of murasaki, who eagerly tried to regenerate her heart as she sucked clouds of dust into her lungs.

name: sakura
normalized: murasaki, you mustn't move right now!
sakura shook her head, then looked murasaki firmly in the eye and told her.

name: sakura
normalized: after all, we're going to escape, right murasaki?
right now, getting out of here comes first…!
she took murasaki's arm by force, and lifted her up on her shoulder.

name: sakura
normalized: you'd do the same for me♪
leaning on sakura's shoulder, murasaki was going to take advantage of the chaos to escape from the arena.
the figure of the monster disappeared into a cloud of dust, which she looked back over her shoulder toward.
would the monster rage around like that until it died there, or would it escape amid the confusion, like them?
murasaki did not know that now.
at least one certain feeling had arisen in the area around her heart, which had started regenerating.
murasaki felt a little pain in her chest, where kiryuu had implanted the tumour―which, in the end, his mind had never reached.
pity… if one were to give a name to this pain, it would probably be that.
while hearing her old friend's cheering voice, murasaki escaped from the collapsing chaos arena.
after that, murasaki never saw the monster that had once been kiryuu sabato again.
